item.description:
Join your Friends for a little holiday cheer at a great place near the MSSF in Plymouth, the East Bay Grille at the Pinehills Golf Club. This is a "Dutch treat" event. The East Bay Grille has great food and a special deal going of 2 meals with a bottle of wine (which you can take home if you and your dinner partner don't finish the whole bottle) for $40. But you don't have to have dinner. There is no minimum charge. You may simply order a beverage or a light snack if you prefer. The Manager has promised us a private room so we can socialize to our hearts' content. Stay for a few minutes or all evening. Bring your sweethearts and friends or family. No age limit. Sorry no dogs. 50 person limit.

For more information and the menu of the East Bay Grille at the Pinehills Golf Club go here:

http://www.pinehillspaviliongrille.com/grille.php

Hope to see you there!

Sharl
item.how_to_find_us: The Ryder Cup Room, East Bay Grille at the Pinehills Golf Club
